definitions.body: :Da 8:11 fixed or established place, foundation (chiefly poet.);—abs. ´[[מ]] Ex 15:17 + 2 t.; cstr. [[מְכוֹן]] 1Ki 8:39 + 10 t.; sf. [[מְכוֹנִי]] Is 18:4, [[מְכוֹנוֹ]] Ezr 2:68; pl. sf. [[מְכוֹנֶיהָ]] Ps 104:5; —

fixed place of ´[[י]]'s abode on earth Ex 15:17 (song), 1Ki 8:13 = 2Ch 6:2 (poet. fragm.: v. LXX and Dr:Intr. 182); = place, or site of God's house Ezr 2:68; [[כָּל־מְכוֹן]] [[הַר־חִיּוֹן]] Is 4:5, appar. = all the extent of Mt. Zion; redund. (si vera l.) [[וְהֻשְׁלַח מְכוֹן מִקְדָּשׁוֹ]] Da 8:11 and the place of his sanctuary shall be thrown down (on difficulties of v., see Bev); of heavens [[מְכוֹן]] [[שִׁבְתְְּ]] 1Ki 8:39, 1Ki 8:43, 1Ki 8:49 = 2Ch 6:30, 2Ch 6:33, 2Ch 6:39, cf. Ps 33:14; [[מְכוֹנִי]] alone Is 18:4; fig. [[חֶדֶק וּמִשְׁפָּט מְכוֹן כִּסְאְֶָ]] Ps 89:15, so Ps 97:2.
foundation, only pl., poet. [[יׇסַד אֶרֶץ]] [[עַל־מְכוֹנֶיהָ]] Ps 104:5.
